A: Who angered Pig? (a) Tortoise (b) Tortoise's wife (c) Wife
Whose wife is in the story? (a) Pig (b) Tortoise (c) Elephant
Who did Tortoise borrow from? (a) Pig (b) Dog (c) Elephant
Where did Pig seek payment? (a) Farm (b) House (c) Field
B: I _________ going to be seven next week. (am)
The pupils _________ in the hall. (are not)
